value.halfverse: the desert shall rejoice and blossom;
value.verse: The wilderness and the dry land shall be glad, *

value.halfverse: and rejoice with joy and singing.

value.verse: They shall see the glory of the Lord, *

value.halfverse: and make firm the feeble knees.

value.verse: Say to the anxious, “Be strong, do not fear! *
value.halfverse: Here is your God, coming with judgment to save you.”
and the ears of the deaf be unstopped.
value.verse: Then shall the eyes of the blind be opened, *
Then shall the lame leap like a deer, *
value.halfverse: and the tongue of the speechless sing for joy.

value.verse: For waters shall break forth in the wilderness *

value.halfverse: and the thirsty ground, springs of water.
value.verse: The burning sand shall become a pool *
The ransomed of God shall return with singing, *
value.halfverse: with everlasting joy upon their heads.
and sorrow and sighing shall flee away.
value.verse: Joy and gladness shall be theirs, *
